RT @WildStoke: Looking back...this time in 2017 we removed a weir on the Trent at Bucknall Park with partners @EnvAgencyMids and @TrentCaba‚Ä¶

Looking back...this time in 2017 we removed a weir on the Trent at Bucknall Park with partners @EnvAgencyMids and @TrentCaba. The weir was stopping fish from moving through the river. Three years on, this stretch is a much better home for trout, bullhead and other river wildlife. https://t.co/RgEF72fxDy
@EnvAgencyMids Hi, do you have more land that needs trees? I work for The Conservation Volunteers and we're looking for sites across the Midlands for next winters tree season üå≥
